title: The Flash
plot: Barry Allen is a Central City police forensic scientist with a reasonably happy life, despite the childhood trauma of a mysterious red and yellow lightning killing his mother and framing his father. All that changes when a massive particle accelerator accident leads to Barry being struck by lightning in his lab. Coming out of coma nine months later, Barry and his new friends at S.T.A.R labs find that he now has the ability to move at superhuman speed. Furthermore, Barry learns that he is but one of many affected by that event, most of whom are using their powers for evil. Determined to make a difference, Barry dedicates his life to fighting such threats, as The Flash. While he gains allies he never expected, there are also secret forces determined to aid and manipulate him for their own agenda.
awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 27 wins & 87 nominations.
stars: Grant Gustin, Candice Patton, Danielle Panabaker, Carlos Valdes
companies: Berlanti Productions, DC Entertainment, Warner Bros. Television

keywords: superhuman speed,dc arrowverse,superhero,dc comics,based on comic

similars.title: Arrow
similars.plot: Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.
similars.stars: Stephen Amell, Katie Cassidy, David Ramsey

similars.title: Supergirl
similars.plot: The adventures of Superman's cousin in her own superhero career.
similars.stars: Melissa Benoist, Chyler Leigh, David Harewood

similars.title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
similars.plot: Time-travelling rogue Rip Hunter has to recruit a rag-tag team of heroes and villains to help prevent an apocalypse that could impact not only Earth, but all of time.
similars.stars: Caity Lotz, Amy Louise Pemberton, Dominic Purcell

similars.title: Lucifer
similars.plot: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.
similars.stars: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro

similars.title: Crisis on Infinite Earths
similars.plot: The Crisis on Infinite Earths has begun throughout the entire multiverse, and heroes of all Earth's band up to stop an invasion and must also stop their Earths from being destroyed.
similars.directors: Directors: Laura Belsey, David McWhirter, and 3 more credits »
similars.stars: Stephen Amell, Grant Gustin, Melissa Benoist

similars.title: Supernatural
similars.plot: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.
similars.stars: Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Jim Beaver

similars.title: Stranger Things
similars.plot: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
similars.stars: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder

similars.title: Criminal Minds
similars.plot: The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.
similars.stars: Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook

similars.title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
similars.plot: The missions of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.
similars.stars: Clark Gregg, Ming-Na Wen, Brett Dalton

similars.title: The Blacklist
similars.plot: A new FBI profiler, Elizabeth Keen, has her entire life uprooted when a mysterious criminal, Raymond Reddington, who has eluded capture for decades, turns himself in and insists on speaking only to her.
similars.stars: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff

similars.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
similars.plot: Comedy series following the exploits of Det. Jake Peralta and his diverse, lovable colleagues as they police the NYPD's 99th Precinct.
similars.stars: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews

similars.title: The Walking Dead
similars.plot: Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes wakes up from a coma to learn the world is in ruins and must lead a group of survivors to stay alive.
similars.stars: Andrew Lincoln, Norman Reedus, Melissa McBride

tvSeriesInfo.creators: Greg Berlanti, Geoff Johns, Andrew Kreisberg
